channel.title: The one and only way to stop server hacking
channel.description:
ok now this is probably the most important thing to keep you pc safe from hackers that "use" you server for a client cinda thing 1. get norton or any other trustable virus scanner 2. make sure you have 2 virus scanners just in case i recommend pc doctor 3. make sure u got some bad ass protective firewall 4. again secondary firewall 5. if you can download a program that moniters incoming and outgoing connctions 6. always scan files you get cuase some files look innocent but lol they may not be. 7. dont and i mean dont try downloading sources that get sent in pms 1.alternative: dont run a server (simple)
i made this so that people wont get hacked like i did lol im such a fucking dumb ass but anyway please dont flame this i just dont want cool poeple like cms and mods and maby even admins (this came out of the orly posts)

item.title: The one and only way to stop server hacking
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

Look at my post. I said if you’re smart you won’t get viruses. I don’t download java files unless it is from somebody I trust. How the fuck can a java file, which is plain text, be a fucking keylogger?

I mentuioned porn because, anybody here over the age of 3 would have looked for porn, found a dodgy site, and got a virus or two from it.

I said what if you don’t have internet, because you said that if you have no protection EVERY computer will have a virus. If you had no internet, then the virus can’t download itself to you, therefore I bummed you out.

Eat shit and die

Read full topic
item.source: The one and only way to stop server hacking

item.title: The one and only way to stop server hacking
item.dc:creator: @nathanmarck nathanmarck
item.description:
@nathanmarck wrote:

[quote=“Budda, post:20, topic:101640”][quote author=nathanmarck link=topic=145812.msg1394301#msg1394301 date=1180446877]

I have 0 anti-virus, and 0 virus’. I’m just smart. Only idiots get virus’.

imposible every computer will have a virus if it dont have protection[quote author=moparRuler link=topic=145812.msg1393457#msg1393457 date=1180424505]
why would people even hack your server?
[/quote]
orly the fucked up bastard
[/quote]

Are you serious?
What if you don’t download porn from dodgy sites, don’t download exe files, don’t have the internet.

I rest my case.[/quote]
then how are you posting u dumb ass also if you download java files some can be keyloggers
why the **** did you mention porn and also why wouldnt you have internet on ur pc if you dont have internet then you cant register windows also i had a disc made by a trusable company and it gave my pc viruses

i rest my fucking case

Read full topic

item.title: The one and only way to stop server hacking
item.dc:creator: @Goodoo_dolls Goodoo dolls
item.description:
@Goodoo_dolls wrote:

[quote=“Eh Pretty Easy, post:8, topic:101640”][quote author=nathanmarck link=topic=145812.msg1389686#msg1389686 date=1180378427]
ok now this is probably the most important thing to keep you pc safe from hackers that “use” you server for a client cinda thing

  1. get norton or any other trustable virus scanner
  2. make sure you have 2 virus scanners just in case i recommend pc doctor
  3. make sure u got some bad ass protective firewall
  4. again secondary firewall
  5. if you can download a program that moniters incoming and outgoing connctions
  6. always scan files you get cuase some files look innocent but lol they may not be.
  7. dont and i mean dont try downloading sources that get sent in pms
    1.alternative: dont run a server (simple)

i made this so that people wont get hacked like i did lol im such a fucking dumb ass but anyway please dont flame this i just dont want cool poeple like cms and mods and maby even admins
(this came out of the orly posts)
[/quote]Oh my god… seriously L2TYPE. Do not get more than one antivirus because if you have more than one, they interfere with each other and let viruses go through. You don’t need a programs that monitors outgoing and incoming connections, that’s useless and you can run servers, why couldn’t you? There is people who remove the code from it and turn it to something for example that shuts down your computer etc. but you can check for yourself.[/quote]

LOL rep++ yea if u have norton and macafee on 1 comp u will have to wipe out the hole thing they can not both work together duH! my grandmas comp got so screwed up even professionals couldn’t fix it lol so she had to buy another $500 pc (prettey cheep lol) then that 1 brok because of the same problem the she bought a $1000 comp and it runs really good)!!

Read full topic

thats what firewalls prevent

[quote=“nathanmarck, post:1, topic:101640”]ok now this is probably the most important thing to keep you pc safe from hackers that “use” you server for a client cinda thing

  1. get norton or any other trustable virus scanner
  2. make sure you have 2 virus scanners just in case i recommend pc doctor
  3. make sure u got some bad ass protective firewall
  4. again secondary firewall
  5. if you can download a program that moniters incoming and outgoing connctions
  6. always scan files you get cuase some files look innocent but lol they may not be.
  7. dont and i mean dont try downloading sources that get sent in pms
    1.alternative: dont run a server (simple)

i made this so that people wont get hacked like i did lol im such a fucking dumb ass but anyway please dont flame this i just dont want cool poeple like cms and mods and maby even admins
(this came out of the orly posts)[/quote]Oh my god… seriously L2TYPE. Do not get more than one antivirus because if you have more than one, they interfere with each other and let viruses go through. You don’t need a program that monitors outgoing and incoming connections, that’s useless and you can run servers, why couldn’t you? There is people who remove the code from it and turn it to something for example that shuts down your computer etc. but you can check for yourself.

item.title: The one and only way to stop server hacking
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Yeah, my computer is kinda fucked now. The BIOS and CMOS are all messed up. I’ve been DDoS’ed a couple of times, which contributed to that I’m thinking. Anyway, I hope people read this because when I ran my server I didn’t even have an anti-virus which was dumb as hell. Seeing as people in this community always wan’t to rip each other’s computers apart. It’s quite sad tbh. Anyway, thanks again. I hope people read this. Try making it look more nice btw.

Read full topic
